title: Got rekt by diana
body:
http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1432071717/brand.png

Typical Diana mains, always completely wrecking %%%%s 24/7

replies.body: 30min game, mid laner has 64 farm. legit af. diana broke as hell.

> [{quoted}](name=CrestKnight,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rFnh65Fa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-06T17:55:58.234+0000)
>
> 30min game, mid laner has 64 farm. legit af. diana broke as hell.

diana zoned him

brand can easily stay out of dianas range and still get farm, this is just failure across the board on brands end and you want to blame diana as being too good when this situation rarely occurs and in fact diana is the one who routinely gets bullied out of lane all of pre 6 because of range and with that lead they continue to bully her.

> [{quoted}](name=CrestKnight,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rFnh65Fa,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-06-06T18:38:10.260+0000)
>
> brand can easily stay out of dianas range and still get farm, this is just failure across the board on brands end and you want to blame diana as being too good when this situation rarely occurs and in fact diana is the one who routinely gets bullied out of lane all of pre 6 because of range and with that lead they continue to bully her.

this game is proof that you are wrong.

your brand being bad, has nothing to do with diana being good, in fact she could very well be average but if brand is running into turrets freely, using his ultimate to clear a wave, and placing his skill shots behind him instead of on stand still minions theres a clear discrepancy here. 

show me your **next 10** brand vs diana matchups and give me their stats.
Yeah, that game's *sooo* recent that {{item:3074}} and {{item:3046}} have different icons!

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rFnh65Fa,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-06T18:27:12.999+0000)
>
> Yeah, that game's *sooo* recent that {{item:3074}} and {{item:3046}} have different icons!

just don't mess with diana.
lesson learned.
how do you change the hud to show team gold??

> [{quoted}](name=Mig89,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rFnh65Fa,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-06T18:52:50.835+0000)
>
> how do you change the hud to show team gold??

you don't.
